description: Table for discharge orders part of the ED navigator provider audit.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DC_VN_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the provider who took an action on the discharge orders in the emergency department navigator.

columns.name: DC_VN_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason category ID for the action taken on an order record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No action


Discontinue on discharge


Resume on discharge


Prescribe


Modify


Cancel


No Change

columns.name: DC_VN_ACT_REASON
columns.description: The reason for the action taken on an order record. This is extracted as the category title.

columns.name: DC_VN_ACT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant an action was taken on discharge orders in an emergency department navigator.

columns.name: DC_VN_PAT_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the contact where the discharge navigator was used. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).
